Text: SQLServer DB user needs to have at least **db_owner** role.

Be also sure also that DB user has these privileges granted which enables system statistics view from backoffice (not mandatory but highly recommended): **"View Any Definition"** and **"View Server State"**.
It is possible to inject environment variables into VGS-DB_url parameter: the format is **[@env.YourVariableName]**.\
Put the relative path of your WAR endpoint:
- If it's the ROOT (ie: your backoffice respond to **https://www.yoursite.com/admin**): just leave an empty string like in the example
- If it's on a subfolder (ie: your backoffice respond to **https://www.yoursite.com/staging/admin**): put **"/staging"**
